LinkItem.internal_link_text: Move data to SQL Server on Azure
Move data to SQL Server on Azure

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: select * from <table_name> where <primary_key> in (select top 10 percent <primary_key> from <table_name> order by newid())
SELECT * FROM <table_name> WHERE 0.1 >= CAST(CHECKSUM(NEWID(), <primary_key>) & 0x7fffffff AS float)/ CAST (0x7fffffff AS int)

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: #Set up the SQL Azure connection import pyodbc conn = pyodbc.connect('DRIVER={SQL Server};SERVER=<servername>;DATABASE=<dbname>;UID=<username>;PWD=<password>')

import pandas as pd
# Query database and load the returned results in pandas data frame data_frame = pd.read_sql('''select column1, cloumn2... from <table_name> tablesample (0.1 percent)''', conn)
